title: 101 Ways to Die in a Hostel
subtitle: Companion Betrayal
series: 101 Ways to Die in a Hostel
tagline: Some hostels are a bargain. Others cost you your life.

synopsis.short: A trusting gap year traveler is murdered by her travel companion of three months who has been planning to steal her inheritance money and disappear.

death_teaser: Some friendships are made to last. Others are made to kill.
